section.title: SSH Keys in LDAP
section.para: This section provides guidance on managing SSH keys within the SIMP environment.

section.title: LDAP Enabled
section.para: When enabled, ssh keys are both stored and retrieved directly from LDAP.

See the
chapter for more information on user management in LDAP.

section.title: Without LDAP
section.para: If LDAP is not being used, use the /etc/ssh/local_keys directory for all user keys.
